00050             inline layer_cell_pair hitToPair(SimCalorimeterHit* hit) {
00051                 int detIDraw = hit->getID();
00052                 detID_.setRawValue(detIDraw);
00053                 detID_.unpack();
00054                 int layer = detID_.getFieldValue("layer");
00055                 int cellid = detID_.getFieldValue("cell");
00056                 return (std::make_pair(layer, cellid));
00057             }
